parameters.query: INSERT INTO elevea.site_settings (site_slug, show_brand, show_phone, show_whatsapp, whatsapp_number, footer_text, color_scheme, theme, custom_css, primary_color, background_color, accent_color, text_color, shadow_color, border_color) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8::jsonb, $9, $10, $11, $12, $13, $14, $15) ON CONFLICT (site_slug) DO UPDATE SET show_brand = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.show_brand, site_settings.show_brand), show_phone = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.show_phone, site_settings.show_phone), show_whatsapp = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.show_whatsapp, site_settings.show_whatsapp), whatsapp_number = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.whatsapp_number, site_settings.whatsapp_number), footer_text = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.footer_text, site_settings.footer_text), color_scheme = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.color_scheme, site_settings.color_scheme), theme = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.theme, site_settings.theme), custom_css = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.custom_css, site_settings.custom_css), primary_color = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.primary_color, site_settings.primary_color), background_color = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.background_color, site_settings.background_color), accent_color = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.accent_color, site_settings.accent_color), text_color = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.text_color, site_settings.text_color), shadow_color = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.shadow_color, site_settings.shadow_color), border_color = COALESCE(EXCLUDED.border_color, site_settings.border_color), updated_at = NOW() RETURNING *
